channel.title: marketing on Tales about Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in marketing on Tales about Software Engineering

item.title: Social network distance
item.description: It’s now about two weeks since the HMRCs splurge on getting the UK to go out for a meal has finished. In discount dining finder I showed how to make a map-based tool to search all Eat Out to Help Out (EOTHO) establishments in very little time. What follows is the story of what happened after the site launched, and how I failed to make a dent at marketing. To recap:
